slide1.title: Machine Learning
slide1.description: Our machine learning services will help you uncover hidden insights and make predictions about your customers' behavior. We can help you build a custom model, integrate it with your existing infrastructure, and deploy it in a production-ready environment.

slide2.title: LaEntrega Co., Ltd
slide2.description: The company's representative director is Arita Kazuto. LA ENTREGA has a wide range of business activities, including import/export, consulting for market entry, e-commerce, advertising, restaurant operation, and international cultural exchange. The company also offers services for foreign tourists and provides management consulting. As of January 8, 2025, its head office is located in Chuo-ku, Fukuoka.

slide3.title: Image, Video and Audio Annotation
slide3.description: Image, video and audio annotation services help you prepare data for machine learning and computer vision projects. Our team of experts annotates your data with high accuracy and speed.

homeAbout.title: WHO WE ARE
homeAbout.subtitle: Your Strategic Technology Partner
homeAbout.description1: SEINXERA is a leading software company based in Nepal, committed to delivering top-notch digital products and services. We specialize in web development, mobile apps, Desktop App, Specialize in AI, IT, IOT and cloud-based solutions.
homeAbout.description2: Our dedicated team works closely with clients to bring their ideas to life and provide scalable, secure, and modern technology solutions. We also focus on advanced technologies.

about.title: About Us
about.tagline: Empowering ideas through technology. We are a passionate team delivering innovative digital solutions.
about.p1: SEINXERA is a leading software company based in Nepal, committed to delivering top-notch digital products and services. We specialize in web development, mobile apps, Desktop App, Specialize in AI, IT, IOT and cloud-based solutions.
about.p2: Our dedicated team works closely with clients to bring their ideas to life and provide scalable, secure, and modern technology solutions. It also focus on advanced technologies
about.missionBody:
Our mission is to create products and services that don't just serve — they transform. We aim to build solutions that impact lives, empower communities, and spark progress.

By developing innovative systems and embracing continuous innovation, we push boundaries and challenge the status quo. We believe in solving real problems with technology, creativity, and purpose — crafting tools that make a difference today and shape a better tomorrow.

Every challenge we take on is an opportunity to deliver lasting impact. Through our commitment to excellence, agility, and innovation, we strive to turn bold ideas into reality.

info.label: Business Description
info.value: We provide one-stop IT solutions from design to development to operation to maintenance.
info.sub: We cover a wide range of areas, from core business to web, apps, and IoT.
points: Cloud-based sales management system and core system development
Developing various solutions that lead to business efficiency
Shift and attendance management system development
E-commerce and cross-border e-commerce related system development
Original CMS development and corporate website production
IoT-related solutions and R&D (facial beauty device IoT, safety management IoT, etc.)
Server construction, operation, and maintenance for AWS, Sakura Cloud, etc.
Graphics business such as image processing and illustration production

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: End-to-end technology services designed to accelerate your digital transformation.

cards.title: Web Development
cards.shortDescription: Corporate websites, dashboards, web apps, CMS platforms.
cards.description: We provide professional web development services including corporate websites, custom web applications, dashboards, and CMS platforms. Our team builds responsive, SEO-friendly, and performance-optimized websites using modern technologies. Whether you need an enterprise web solution, e-commerce platform, or scalable SaaS product, we deliver secure and user-focused digital experiences.

cards.title: AI/ML Solutions
cards.shortDescription: Intelligent systems for automation, analytics and prediction.
cards.description: We deliver advanced Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) solutions that help businesses automate processes, extract actionable insights, and make data-driven decisions. Our services include predictive analytics, computer vision, natural language processing (NLP), recommendation systems, and custom AI model development. From automation to intelligent forecasting, we build scalable AI systems tailored to your business needs.

cards.title: Desktop Development
cards.shortDescription: Business tools, internal systems, productivity software.
cards.description: Our desktop application development services focus on building secure, high-performance business software, internal systems, and productivity tools. We design and develop cross-platform and Windows-based desktop applications tailored to enterprise workflows. From automation tools to complex business management systems, we create reliable desktop solutions that improve operational efficiency.

cards.title: Mobile Applications
cards.shortDescription: Application development for Android and iOS.
cards.description: Our mobile development services focus on creating high-quality applications for Android and iOS platforms. We build native and cross-platform mobile apps with seamless user experiences, robust functionality, and modern design. Whether you need a consumer-facing app, enterprise mobile solution, or custom mobile software, we deliver scalable and secure applications that meet your business goals.

cards.title: CAD Development
cards.description: Our CAD development services provide precise 2D and 3D drafting, CAD tracing, technical drawings, and detailed engineering documentation. We support architects, engineers, and construction professionals with high-accuracy designs, digitization of legacy drawings, and production-ready CAD files. Our team ensures compliance with industry standards and delivers scalable drafting solutions for infrastructure and industrial projects.

cards.title: Data Annotation
cards.shortDescription: Image, text, audio, and video annotation.
cards.description: We offer high-quality data annotation services for machine learning and AI training datasets, including image annotation, text labeling, audio transcription, and video tagging. Our accurate and scalable data labeling solutions support computer vision, NLP, autonomous systems, and AI model training. With strict quality control and secure workflows, we help organizations build reliable AI systems powered by clean, structured data.

cards.title: OCR and Data Entry
cards.shortDescription: Invoice processing, document digitization, data migration.
cards.description: We provide OCR (Optical Character Recognition) and data entry services to convert physical documents into structured digital data. Our solutions include invoice processing, document digitization, bulk data migration, and automated text extraction. By combining intelligent OCR technology with quality assurance processes, we help businesses streamline operations, reduce manual workload, and improve data accuracy.

teams.title: Our IT Team
teams.subtitle: At SEINXERA, we are a leading IT company delivering cutting-edge solutions in software development, cloud services, and cybersecurity. Meet our talented team driving innovation!

testimonials.t1: A proactive Junior Manager responsible for supervising development processes and coordinating across teams. Oversees project progress, supports team growth, and ensures that design, development, and execution align with organizational goals.
testimonials.t2: A detail-oriented Junior Developer who supports core development tasks across the application. Works closely with the team to implement features, fix bugs, and continuously improve system performance and reliability.
testimonials.t3: An AI/ML Developer experienced in designing and implementing intelligent chatbot solutions. Focuses on natural language processing, model integration, and delivering practical AI features that enhance user interaction and automation.
testimonials.t4: A motivated Web Developer with a strong foundation in modern web technologies. Actively contributes to building responsive, user-friendly interfaces while learning best practices in frontend and backend development.
testimonials.t5: A creative UI/UX Designer with a keen eye for visual design and usability. Assists in crafting intuitive layouts, wireframes, and design components that improve overall user experience.
testimonials.t6: A passionate UI/UX Designer focused on user-centered design principles. Contributes to research, prototyping, and refining interfaces to ensure consistency, accessibility, and visual clarity.

intro.title: Discover a career where your ideas matter, your growth is supported, and your work makes a difference.

card.title: Developer Intern
card.description: We’re always looking for passionate, creative, and talented individuals to grow with us. If you're excited to work on meaningful projects, thrive in a collaborative environment, and want to shape the future—let’s talk.

first.title: Internship Program
first.text: Our internship program is designed for passionate learners who want to grow their skills, gain real-world experience, and explore career paths in a professional environment. Over the course of 3 months, interns will collaborate on real projects, receive mentorship, and develop hands-on expertise in their chosen field.

second.title: Career Growth
second.text: Every team member has a development plan with initiatives aimed at improving skills and embracing innovation. As we grow rapidly, our development plans stay adaptive and ensure our workforce stays best-in-class with ability, aspiration, and commitment.

join.title: Can't find your job? Don't worry!
join.text: Our team will reach out to you when we have the opening.

footer.ctaTitle: Take the first step towards a digitally engineered tomorrow
